TopicTitle: One road map item in almost a year and a half

Articles.Content: Lol.  It's insane to even say out loud.

February 24th 2023 was 1 years, 1 months and 20 days ago, which is 414 days.

~548 days is 1.5 years.

So far we’re ~75.5% of the way to 1.5 years  (will be there in 134 days)

Still a long time for only the one milestone, but “almost 1.5 years” is maybe a bit much
